title.value: Концептуальные основы формирования единой системы переподготовки и повышения квалификации кадров АПК союзного государства 'Россия-Беларусь'
Conceptual framework of the formation of unified system of retraining and postgraduate education of agroindustrial complex personnel of common state 'Russia-Belarus'
Conceptual framework of the formation of unified system of retraining and postgraduate education of agroindustrial complex personnel of common state 'Russia-Belarus'

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Yakovchik, N.S., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Zhuk, Yu.N., Belarus State Economic Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Conceptual questions of innovative updating of agro-industrial complex of the Union State of Russian Federation and Belarus through the creation of the uniform system of continuous formation of personnel are considered. Measures for the organization of uniform educational space in a context of the Program of retraining and professional development of skilled personnel of agrarian and industrial complex of the Union State of Russian Federation and Belarus are defined.
